p:
Insulin concentration was determined through a fully automated chemiluminescence assay (LIAISON C-Peptide, Byk-Sangtec; reference value: 3.21–16.32 µIU/mL) [ 33]. Blood glucose level (FBS) was measured by enzymatic methods using commercial kits (Pars Azemun, Isfahan, Iran) and the auto-analyzer system (Selectra E, Vitalab, Netherlands; reference value: 70–115 mg/dL). Homeostatic model assessment for insulin resistance (HOMA-IR) was calculated according to
HOMA − IR =
Glucose
×
Insulin
405
formula. It is noteworthy to mention that the 75th percentiles of HOMA-IR in the whole population, in normal-weight, and in obese people are 3.027, 1.68, and 3.42, respectively.
